Middle.description:
You stand at the center of the arena. The air is tense, and all sections surround you. 
 There is a large cornucopia nearby, full of useful supplies

items.name: Medicine Pack
items.description: A plastic pack filled with medicine

items.name: Bow and Arrow
items.description: A wooden weapon, maybe helpful.

items.name: Sword
items.description: A shiny, silver sword.

items.name: Boots
items.description: Old boots covered in mud.

items.name: Raft
items.description: A wooden raft to keep you afloat.

items.name: Logs
items.description: Some heavy wooden logs.

items.name: Rope
items.description: A sturdy piece of rope.

items.name: Knife
items.description: A shiny knife, useful in many situations.

Section1.description: You are in Section 1. Mist rises from the swampy ground.

items.name: First Aid Kit
items.description: A plastic box full of useful supplies

items.name: Spear
items.description: A sharp weapon for defense and hunting.

items.name: Rope
items.description: A sturdy piece of rope.

items.name: Pouch
items.description: A small bag to carry vital supplies.

items.name: Flare
items.description: Signals for help or distracts enemies.

Section2.description: You are in Section 2. The air smells of smoke. Trees are burning here.

items.name: Medicine Pack
items.description: A plastic pack filled with medicine

items.name: Axe
items.description: Heavy weapon for combat or chopping obstacles.

items.name: Binoculars
items.description: Zoom in to spot distant dangers or supplies.

items.name: Spear
items.description: A sharp weapon for defense and hunting.

items.name: Camouflage Cloth
items.description: Blend into the surroundings to hide from enemies or wild creatures.

items.name: Rope
items.description: A sturdy piece of rope.

Section3.description: You are in Section 3. Lightning strikes in the distance.

items.name: Rope
items.description: A sturdy piece of rope.

items.name: Pouch
items.description: A small bag to carry vital supplies.

items.name: Flashlight
items.description: Illuminate dark areas to spot dangers or hidden paths.

Section4.description: You are in Section 4. The ground is cracked and dry. It's hot here.

items.name: First Aid Kit
items.description: A plastic box full of useful supplies

items.name: Compass
items.description: To find your direction and navigate the arena safely

items.name: Camouflage Cloth
items.description: Blend into the surroundings to hide from enemies or wild creatures.

items.name: Sword
items.description: A shiny, silver sword.

Section5.description: You are in Section 5. A large body of water blocks your path.

items.name: Water Bottle
items.description: A half-full bottle of water.

items.name: Matches
items.description: Could be useful for light, signals, or warmth.

items.name: Fishing Net
items.description: A net useful for catching fish.

items.name: Map
items.description: Useful for directions.

Section6.description: You are in Section 6. Bees buzz loudly. Watch out!

items.name: First Aid Kit
items.description: A plastic box full of useful supplies

items.name: Bee Smoke Canister
items.description: Used to calm bees.

items.name: Compass
items.description: To find your direction and navigate the arena safely

items.name: Chainsaw
items.description: Powerful tool to cut through thick obstacles quickly.

items.name: Water Bottle
items.description: Essential for hydration and survival in the arena.

Section7.description: You are in Section 7. Thick fog surrounds you. Visibility is low.

items.name: Flashlight
items.description: A small flashlight with low battery.

items.name: Fog Cloak
items.description: A cloak that helps you blend into fog.

Section8.description: You are in Section 8. The forest is quiet, too quiet...

items.name: Medicine Pack
items.description: A plastic pack filled with medicine

items.name: Camouflage Cloth
items.description: Helps you blend in with trees.

items.name: Quiet Boots
items.description: Soft boots that make no sound.

items.name: Map
items.description: Useful for directions.

items.name: Tool Kit
items.description: A pack with a variety of useful tools.

items.name: Earplugs
items.description: To block out harmful noises.

items.name: Compass
items.description: Useful for directions.

Section9.description: You are in Section 9. You hear distant cannon shots.

items.name: Spear
items.description: A sharp weapon for defense and hunting.

items.name: Rope
items.description: A sturdy piece of rope.

items.name: Flashlight
items.description: Illuminate dark areas to spot dangers or hidden paths.

Section10.description: You are in Section 10. A field of strange flowers surrounds you.

items.name: Medicine Pack
items.description: A plastic pack filled with medicine

items.name: Sleep Flower
items.description: Smells sweet but may be dangerous.

items.name: Camouflage Cloth
items.description: Blend into the surroundings to hide from enemies or wild creatures.

items.name: Map
items.description: Useful for directions.

items.name: Spear
items.description: A sharp weapon for defense and hunting.

Section11.description: You are in Section 11. The trees here are filled with tracker jackers.

items.name: Tracker Jacker Repellent
items.description: A strong-smelling substance to keep bugs away.

items.name: Honey Pot
items.description: A small pot of honey.

items.name: Bow and Arrow
items.description: A wooden weapon, maybe helpful.

items.name: Blanket
items.description: Warmth and comfort during cold nights.

items.name: Matches
items.description: Could be useful for light, signals, or warmth.

Section12.description: You are in Section 12. You see ruins of an old building.

items.name: Medicine Pack
items.description: A plastic pack filled with medicine

items.name: Broken Map
items.description: A torn piece of a map showing part of the arena.

items.name: Rusty Key
items.description: An old key covered in rust.
